descr: "This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules, order sets and protocols."

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "Indicates a category the goal falls within."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as \"control blood pressure\" or \"negotiate an obstacle course\" or \"dance with child at wedding\"."

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "Identifies the expected level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the defined goal."

fields.name: start
fields.descr: "The event after which the goal should begin being pursued."

fields.name: addresses
fields.descr: "Identifies problems, conditions, issues, or concerns the goal is intended to address."

fields.name: documentation
fields.descr: "Didactic or other informational resources associated with the goal that provide further supporting information about the goal. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources."

fields.name: target
fields.descr: "Indicates what should be done and within what timeframe."
